content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) extracting coal, with drop position at (52.5, -84.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (52.5, -84.5) and (54.5, -84.5) storing coal

### Copper Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (-23.0, -68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) extracting copper ore, with drop position at (23.5, -69.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-23.5, -69.5) and (-24.5, -67.5) storing copper ore

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) extracting iron ore, with drop position at (-14.5, -54.5)
- Wooden Chests at positions (-14.5, -54.5), (-12.5, -54.5), and (-13.5, -54.5) storing iron ore
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -54.5) moving items between chests
- Stone Furnace at position (-20.0, -70.0) processing iron ore into iron plates

### Copper Plate Production Facility at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) processing copper ore into copper plates
- Wooden Chests at positions (0.5, -4.5), (5.5, -4.5), (0.5, -2.5), (0.5, -3.5), (5.5, -2.5), and (5.5, -3.5) storing copper ore

### Iron Ore and Plate Storage Facility at Position (-18.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chests at positions (-18.5, -61.5), (-20.5, -61.5), and (-23.5, -61.5) storing iron ore and iron plates
- Burner Inserter at position (-19.5, -61.5) moving items between chests

### Belt System for Material Transport
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup connecting positions (1.5, 1.5) to (3.5, 1.5) and (3.5, 2.5) to (5.5, 2.5) for transporting materials

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors When Inserting Items into Full Inventory
- Ensure that the target inventory has enough space before attempting to insert items. Consider extracting items from the inventory to free up space if necessary.

### Errors with Inserters Waiting for Source Items
- Check that the source inventory has the necessary items available for the inserter to function. Ensure that the inserter is correctly positioned and configured to pick up items from the source.

### Errors with Mining Drills Running Out of Fuel
- Regularly monitor the fuel levels of mining drills and refuel them as needed to prevent interruptions in resource extraction.

### Errors with Furnaces Having Full Output
- Regularly extract processed items from furnaces to prevent them from becoming full and halting production. Consider using inserters to automate the extraction process.
